summary: This bill, the "EITC for Older Workers Act of 2025," aims to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. Specifically, it seeks to repeal the upper age limit for eligibility for the earned income tax credit (EITC). The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on April 21, 2025, and referred to the Committee on Ways and Means. If passed, the amendment would apply to taxable years starting after December 31, 2025.
